tool_description: Manages the queue of content requiring human review, prioritizing items based on urgency and routing to appropriate reviewers.

content_id.description: Unique identifier for the content item

priority_level.description: Review priority: low, normal, high, or urgent

content_summary.description: Summary of content and detected issues

reviewer_specialization.description: Required reviewer expertise: general, violence, gore, or sensitive

error_messages: Invalid content ID: content_id must be a non-empty string.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, normal, high, urgent].
Invalid reviewer specialization: Use one of [general, violence, gore, sensitive].
Queue management failed: Could not add item to review queue.
Content summary required: content_summary cannot be empty.
usage: Provide content_id, moderation_decision, priority_level, and content_summary to queue content for human review. Optionally specify reviewer_specialization for expert review.

assigned_reviewer.description: ID or name of assigned reviewer (if available)

review_ticket_id.description: Unique ticket ID for tracking the review

queue_status.description: Current status: queued, assigned, in_progress, or completed
